J.R. Smith

Earl Smith III ▪ Instagram: teamswish

(The Prodigy, J.R. Swish, Henny God, 911)

Position: Shooting Guard and Small Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-6, 225lb (198cm, 102kg)

Born: September 9, 1985 in Freehold, New Jersey us

Relatives: Brother Chris Smith

College: North Carolina A&T - attended but did not play

High School: St. Benedict's Prep in Newark, New Jersey

Recruiting Rank: 2004 (23)

Draft: New Orleans Hornets, 1st round (18th pick, 18th overall), 2004 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 3, 2004

Career Length: 16 years

  • 2x NBA Champ
  • 2012-13 Sixth Man

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is J.R. Smith?

J.R. Smith is 39 years old.

Where was J.R. Smith born?

J.R. Smith was born in Freehold, New Jersey.

When was J.R. Smith born?

J.R. Smith was born on September 9, 1985.

How tall is J.R. Smith?

J.R. Smith is 6-6 (198 cm) tall.

How much did J.R. Smith weigh when playing?

J.R. Smith weighed 225 lbs (102 kg) when playing.

Is J.R. Smith in the Hall of Fame?

J.R. Smith is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was J.R. Smith drafted?

J.R. Smith was drafted by New Orleans Hornets, 1st round (18th pick, 18th overall), 2004 NBA Draft.

What position did J.R. Smith play?

Shooting Guard and Small Forward.

When did J.R. Smith retire?

J.R. Smith last played in 2020.

What is J.R. Smith's net worth?

J.R. Smith made at least $91,486,193 playing professional basketball.

How much did J.R. Smith make?

J.R. Smith made $14,720,000 in 2019.

What did J.R. Smith average?

J.R. Smith averaged 12.4 points, 3.1 rebounds, and 2.1 assists per game.

How many rings does J.R. Smith have?

J.R. Smith won 2 championships.

What is J.R. Smith's Twitter account?

J.R. Smith is on Twitter at TheRealJRSmith.

What is J.R. Smith's Instagram account?

J.R. Smith is on Instagram at teamswish.

What schools did J.R. Smith attend?

J.R. Smith attended St. Benedict's Prep in Newark, New Jersey and North Carolina A&T - attended but did not play.

What are J.R. Smith's nicknames?

The Prodigy, J.R. Swish, Henny God, 911 are nicknames for J.R. Smith.
